name: UIStatusBarStyle
desc: Constants that describe the style of the deviceâ€™s status bar.

items.name: case `default`
items.desc: A status bar that automatically chooses light or dark content based on the user interface style.

items.name: case lightContent
items.desc: A light status bar, intended for use on dark backgrounds.

items.name: case darkContent
items.desc: A dark status bar, intended for use on light backgrounds.
